Package com.upsight.android.marketing

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    UpsightBillboard.Handler
    The interface that must be implemented to handle callbacks associated with an UpsightBillboard.
    UpsightBillboardManager
    Manager that handles Billboard objects.
    UpsightMarketingApi
    The Upsight Marketing API.
    UpsightMarketingComponent
    The Marketing dagger.Component interface.
    UpsightPurchase
    Data bundle representing a unit of virtual goods to be purchased.
    UpsightReward
    Data bundle representing a unit of virtual goods to be rewarded.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    UpsightBillboard
    A billboard eligible for receiving marketing content.
    UpsightBillboard.AttachParameters
    Parameters for attaching marketing content to an UpsightBillboard.
    UpsightBillboard.Dimensions
    Preferred dimensions for the marketing content view.
    UpsightBillboardHandlers
    A class used to instantiate the default Fragment-based implementations of UpsightBillboard.Handler.
    UpsightBillboardHandlers.DefaultHandler
    An UpsightBillboard.Handler implementation that displays the marketing content according to the UpsightBillboard.PresentationStyle that the marketing content prefers to be rendered in.
    UpsightBillboardHandlers.DialogHandler
    An UpsightBillboard.Handler implementation that displays the marketing content in a dialog window when the content view becomes available.
    UpsightBillboardHandlers.FullscreenHandler
    An UpsightBillboard.Handler implementation that displays the marketing content in a full-screen window when the content view becomes available.
    UpsightContentMediator<T>
    The UpsightContentMediator interface implemented by components that supply Billboard with content.
    UpsightMarketingContentStore
    A storage for marketing content.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    UpsightBillboard.Dimensions.LayoutOrientation
    Layout orientations.
    UpsightBillboard.PresentationStyle
    Preferred presentation styles for the marketing content view.
